import React, { Component } from "react"; class Carousel extends Component { state = { imgactive: "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_CoolieNo1LaunchWPChristmas/6b906821-46c8-4af2-aa9c-44ab4ffcc1cd._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", imgurls: [ "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_YearEnder2020SuperheroV2/5cf56731-63ad-403e-bec2-d6e22869d112._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_SylviesLove/b487f3be-d58a-41dd-a27b-73db6d889dbc._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_UnpausedReviewWatchParty/c7ab71c3-3e7c-47b4-8e3c-99fadf6d628d._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_EnglishAlwaysOnPhase2V2/27e7ef5a-21be-4666-b275-30d7d42af51b._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_MortalKombatLegendsScorpionRevenge/49e9351e-ef26-44fb-b8a8-042b6880ba50._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_WatchPartySuperhero/f320cb89-f3ab-4e2c-8f8a-57f95b1e188b._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_ACallToSpyWPREviews/de007678-b7cf-461d-9fca-dae4afd6c15d._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_LikeABoss/a973cc49-f258-4863-8a22-96de7700d885._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/digital/video/sonata/Hero_IN_Office_v1/2efa5ef6-b2f4-4c6f-ab0f-a120fa7d934a._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_DurgamatiWPRevised/7f1aa98a-cd1b-4bca-b168-74021df5fab9._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/sonata-images-prod/PV_IN_TheWildsWPRevised/de0d0720-e4eb-4cb7-bc54-d04d4be0546c._UR3000,600_SX3000_FMwebp_.jpg", ], }; render() { return (
{this.state.imgurls.map((url, index) => index != 0 ? (
) : (
) )} ;

); } } export default Carousel;
